attributes.action: Step in not only as prime minister but as a fellow Scot and have George Burley removed from managing the Scotland National Side
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being so close under Walter Smith and Alex Mcleish to returning to an international competition, George Burley has come along and ruined it all! Think of it this way, an international manager is like a business project manager, if the project specification is not fulfilled you sack the project manager...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
